import {useLocation} from 'react-router' import {useEffect} from 'react' import "./SinglePost.css"; const SinglePost = () => { const location = useLocation() const path=location.pathname.split('/')[2] useEffect(()=>{ const getPost =async ()=>{ const res=await axois.get("/posts/"+path) console.log(res) } }) return ( <>
